text: Good morning.
Good morning, how are you doing?
I'm great, thank you for asking! Do you have some time today to talk about an amazing charity I am part of?
Sure, I'd love to hear what charity you participate in
It's called Save the Children and we work towards helping disadvantaged children around the world have adequate food, shelter and healthcare.
Sounds wonderful! Do you only work in the US?
Great question. No, we work all around the world, wherever our help is needed.
What a great charity, is there anything I can do to help?
Absolutely, we are always looking for individuals who are willing to contribute to the cause.
How much are you looking for?
A donation of just $1 can help feed a child for 5 days.
And specifically, where does that money go towards?
The money goes towards providing meals and clean water.
I'd be interested in donating to your cause
That's great! Thank you very much for your donation!
Happy to be able to help such a worthy cause!
The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
One last question - are all members who help volunteer based?
We do maintain support staff in country who are paid a living wage, but the rest of our staff are volunteers.
Great! Thanks so much and I'm just so happy to be able to donate
